author: Reuters Editorial
title: Instant View: Weekly US jobless claims top 6 million for first time
description: The number of Americans filing claims for unemployment benefits last week shot to a record high for a second week in a row - topping 6 million - as more jurisdictions enforced stay-at-home measures to curb the coronavirus pandemic, which economists say has pu…
